com.rexsl.test

Interface TestClient


  • public interface TestClient
    A universal class for in-container testing of your web application.

    Implementation of this interface shall be immutable and thread-safe.

    Version:
    $Id: TestClient.java 2344 2013-01-13 18:28:44Z guard $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary
